text: Some of the things in HubSpot API are self taught or you need to figure them out yourself. Lucky there's a Slack channel already for almost everything. :v: :+1:

When it comes to Object/Association IDs you almost always need to run a test get request to find out what the number is. When it is not one of the standards I mentioned.
At least that is what I do on the odd occasions I need the IDs

Hi all,
In serverless function, I have to call a third party API to do some verification, their API access uses OAuth which expires every 1 hour.
So I have to save the access token somewhere and the expires time as well.
Where do I save them. Should I save them in HubDB. I don't feel its secure.
Has anyone done this before. Your help would be much appreciated.

Thank you all.
